name: Perplexity AI
use_cases: Academic research, fact-checking, real-time search, information synthesis
short_desc: AI-powered search engine that provides real-time answers with cited sources
long_desc: Perplexity AI is an AI-powered search engine that combines large language models with real-time web search to provide accurate, cited answers. It excels at research tasks, fact-checking, and providing up-to-date information with transparent sourcing.
creator: Perplexity AI

name: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
use_cases: Content creation, code analysis, research assistance, creative writing
short_desc: Advanced AI assistant with strong reasoning capabilities and ethical alignment
long_desc: Claude 3.5 Sonnet is Anthropic's most advanced AI model, designed with Constitutional AI principles for helpful, harmless, and honest interactions. It excels at complex reasoning, code analysis, creative tasks, and maintaining ethical guidelines.
creator: Anthropic

name: Stability AI SDXL
use_cases: Digital art creation, concept visualization, marketing materials, creative design
short_desc: Advanced text-to-image generation model for high-quality artistic content
long_desc: Stability AI's SDXL (Stable Diffusion XL) is a state-of-the-art text-to-image generation model that creates high-resolution, detailed images from text descriptions. It's widely used for artistic creation, design work, and visual content generation.
creator: Stability AI

name: RunwayML Gen-3
use_cases: Video content creation, animation, film production, marketing videos
short_desc: AI-powered video generation and editing platform for creative professionals
long_desc: RunwayML Gen-3 is an advanced AI video generation platform that creates high-quality videos from text prompts or images. It's used by filmmakers, content creators, and marketing professionals for rapid video prototyping and production.
creator: Runway

name: Cohere Command R+
use_cases: Enterprise search, document analysis, business intelligence, customer support
short_desc: Enterprise-focused AI model optimized for retrieval-augmented generation
long_desc: Cohere's Command R+ is an enterprise-grade large language model optimized for retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) use cases. It excels at processing business documents, enterprise search, and providing accurate information from company knowledge bases.
creator: Cohere

name: ElevenLabs Voice AI
use_cases: Voice cloning, audiobook narration, podcast creation, multilingual dubbing
short_desc: Advanced AI voice synthesis and cloning platform
long_desc: ElevenLabs provides state-of-the-art AI voice synthesis technology that can clone voices, generate speech in multiple languages, and create natural-sounding audio content. It's widely used for content creation, accessibility, and entertainment.
creator: ElevenLabs

name: Replicate
use_cases: Model deployment, AI experimentation, research, rapid prototyping
short_desc: Platform for running and deploying machine learning models in the cloud
long_desc: Replicate is a platform that makes it easy to run machine learning models in the cloud. It hosts thousands of open-source models and provides simple APIs for developers to integrate AI capabilities into their applications.
creator: Replicate

name: Hugging Face Transformers
use_cases: Natural language processing, model fine-tuning, research, open-source AI
short_desc: Open-source platform for natural language processing and machine learning models
long_desc: Hugging Face is the leading platform for sharing and collaborating on machine learning models, particularly in natural language processing. It provides pre-trained models, datasets, and tools for AI researchers and developers.
creator: Hugging Face

name: DeepL Translator
use_cases: Document translation, real-time translation, multilingual communication
short_desc: AI-powered translation service with superior accuracy for multiple languages
long_desc: DeepL uses advanced neural networks to provide highly accurate translations between multiple languages. It's known for producing more natural and contextually appropriate translations compared to traditional services.
creator: DeepL

name: Luma AI Dream Machine
use_cases: 3D content creation, photogrammetry, AR/VR development, product visualization
short_desc: AI platform for creating 3D content and videos from photos and text
long_desc: Luma AI's Dream Machine generates high-quality 3D models and videos from photos or text descriptions. It's used for creating immersive content, product visualization, and rapid 3D prototyping.
creator: Luma AI

name: Synthesia
use_cases: Corporate training videos, marketing content, educational materials, multilingual video creation
short_desc: AI video generation platform with realistic human avatars
long_desc: Synthesia creates professional videos using AI avatars that can speak in multiple languages. It's widely used for corporate training, marketing, and educational content where human presenters are needed without filming costs.
creator: Synthesia

name: Otter.ai
use_cases: Meeting transcription, note-taking, interview recording, accessibility
short_desc: AI-powered meeting transcription and note-taking assistant
long_desc: Otter.ai provides real-time transcription of meetings, interviews, and conversations with speaker identification and automatic summary generation. It's widely used for business meetings, interviews, and accessibility purposes.
creator: Otter.ai

name: Notion AI
use_cases: Content creation, documentation, project management, writing assistance
short_desc: AI-powered writing and productivity assistant integrated into Notion workspace
long_desc: Notion AI is integrated directly into the Notion workspace, providing writing assistance, content generation, and productivity features. It helps users create documents, brainstorm ideas, and manage projects more efficiently.
creator: Notion

name: Gamma
use_cases: Slide deck creation, presentation design, document formatting, visual storytelling
short_desc: AI-powered presentation and document creation platform
long_desc: Gamma uses AI to create beautiful presentations, documents, and web pages from simple text prompts. It automates design decisions and layout optimization, making professional content creation accessible to everyone.
creator: Gamma

name: Jasper AI
use_cases: Marketing copy, blog posts, social media content, email campaigns
short_desc: AI copilot for enterprise marketing teams and content creators
long_desc: Jasper AI is designed specifically for marketing and content creation, offering brand voice training, campaign planning, and high-quality content generation. It's used by enterprise marketing teams and content creators worldwide.

name: Character.AI

long_desc: Pika Labs specializes in AI-generated short videos, allowing users to create engaging animated content from text prompts or images. It's popular for social media content creation and creative storytelling.
